Uses of Class
moteur.Player

  • Packages that use Player 
    Package Description
    controller
    The package controller containes two classes, the Starter and the GameController.
    moteur
    The package moteur containes the classes of Arbitre, Cards, CardsAJouer, CarteCouleur, CarteValeur, DrawDeck, InvalidNumberException, Jest, Observable, Offer, Player, PlayerReel, PlayerVirtuel, Stack, Trophie and Visitor.
    moteur.strategy
    Given the fact that a PlayerVirtuel should make the disicion like a humain do, at the meantime they should act differently according to the level of difficulity chosen before a game start, we use the Design Pattern Stragety to realize that.
    Vue
    Using the concept "VMP", this packages containes the views of the project.

    • Uses of Player in moteur

      Subclasses of Player in moteur 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PlayerReel
      The class PlayerReel is a player, so it extends Player, thus, a PlayerReel will take all of the attributs and methodes of its super class.
      class  PlayerVirtuel
      The class PlayerVirtual is also a player, so it extends Player, thus, a PlayerVirtual will take all of the attributs and methodes of its super class.
      Methods in moteur that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Player Trophie.BestJest()
      The FIRST type of the trophy.
      Player CardsAJouer.checkTrophyCondition()
      Methode aimes to check the condiction of winning a CardAJouer with the trophie
      Player Trophie.Highest​(CarteCouleur couleurConditionDemande)
      The FIRST type of the trophy.
      Player Trophie.Joker()
      The FIRST type of the trophy.
      Player Trophie.Joker_BestJest()
      The FIRST type of the trophy.
      Player Trophie.Lowest​(CarteCouleur couleurCondition)
      The FIRST type of the trophy.
      Player Trophie.Majority​(CarteValeur valeur)
      The FIRST type of the trophy.
      Methods in moteur with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int Arbitre.checkJest​(Player player)
      checkJest(Player player) is used to calcul total points of a jest, particularly, of certain players.
      int Visitor.checkJest​(Player player)
      checkJest(Player player) is used to calcul total points of a jest, particularly, of certain players.
      void Player.chooseSomeonesOffer​(Player player, int index)
      A player must choose one card from the Offer.

    • Uses of Player in moteur.strategy

      Methods in moteur.strategy with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void faceUpTheBigger.makeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      Aims to choose one card face up, this methode will choose the bigger card in order to minimize the lose and try to maximize the gain.
      void faceUpTheFirst.makeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      Aims to choose one card face up, this methode will choose the first card.
      void randomTake.makeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      This strategy does not need to realize the methode to make an offer, but due to the interface Strategy it implements, it should implement the inherited abstract methode.
      void Strategy.makeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      Ask the player to make an offer.
      void takeTheBest.makeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      This strategy does not need to realize the methode to make an offer, but due to the interface Strategy it implements, it should implement the inherited abstract methode.
      void takeTheBestEnfer.makeOffer​(Player player_own)
      This strategy does not need to realize the methode to make an offer, but due to the interface Strategy it implements, it should implement the inherited abstract methode.
      void PlayerVirtuelContext.startExecuteMakeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      Methode to ask a player to make offer to others.
      void PlayerVirtuelContext.startExecuteTakeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      Methode to ask a player to take offer from others.
      void faceUpTheBigger.takeOffer​(Player player_own)
      This strategy does not need to realize the methode to take an offer, but due to the interface Strategy it implements, it should implement the inherited abstract methode.
      void faceUpTheFirst.takeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      This strategy does not need to realize the methode to take an offer, but due to the interface Strategy it implements, it should implement the inherited abstract methode.
      void randomTake.takeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      Aims to get whatever card on the table.
      void Strategy.takeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      Ask the player to take an offer.
      void takeTheBest.takeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      void takeTheBest(Player playerOwn) aims to get the best card on the table, it will check all the cards face-up in the jests of others and take it, in order to minimize the lose and try to maximize the gain
      void takeTheBestEnfer.takeOffer​(Player playerOwn)
      void takeTheBestEnfer(Player player_own) aims to get the best card on the table, here it is a mode of "enfer", we give the virtual players a special previlige to check all the cards in the jests of others, whether it is faced-up or not, in order to minimize the lose and try to maximize the gain.

    • Uses of Player in Vue

      Constructors in Vue with parameters of type Player 
      Constructor Description
      checkButton​(Player player)
      The constructor for checkJbutton.It will create a button who is responsible for creating another window to show exactlly the player's window and who can be used anytime.
      checkJestDialog​(Player player)
      The constructor for checkJestDialog.It will create a window with the help of function check_card showing the cards in the player's Jest.
      VuePlayer​(Player player)
      The constructor for VuePlayer.It will create a JPanel with all elements complete of a player.For example, its offer and its name.
